stanza.line: Thine eyes I love and they as pitying meme
Knowing thy heart torment me with disdaindisdain
Have put on black and loving mourners bebe
Looking with pretty ruth upon my painpain
And truly not the morning sun of heavenheaven
Better becomes the grey cheeks of the easteast
Nor that full star that ushers in the eveneven
Doth half that glory to the sober westwest
As those two mourning eyes become thy faceface
O let it then as well beseem thy heartheart
To mourn for me since mourning doth thee gracegrace
And suit thy pity like in every partpart
Then will I swear beauty herself is blackblack
And all they foul that thy complexion lacklack
